He kept darting glances at his phone during the meeting.
The smoke began to smother everyone in the small room.
She nodded politely and walked away.
Be careful, the floor is slippery.
He hollered across the street to get my attention.
The kids screamed with delight at the surprise party.
This flower is especially fragrant in the morning.
You are granted access to the building during business hours.
The hero fought for justice until the very end.
Weathering has worn down the surface of the old statue.
korean: 그는 회의 중에 계속해서 휴대폰을 힐끗힐끗 봤어요.
연기가 작은 방 안의 모두를 질식시킬 정도였어요.
그녀는 정중히 고개를 끄덕이고 자리를 떴어요.
그는 내 주의를 끌기 위해 길 건너에서 고함을 질렀어요.
아이들은 깜짝 파티에 기뻐서 소리를 질렀어요.
업무 시간 동안 건물 출입이 허용됩니다.
그 영웅은 끝까지 정의를 위해 싸웠어요.
